Package arcade.env.comp

Class Sites

java.lang.Object
arcade.env.comp.Sites
All Implemented Interfaces:
Component, java.io.Serializable, sim.engine.Steppable
Direct Known Subclasses:
SourceSites
public abstract class Sites
extends java.lang.Object
implements Component
Implementation of Component for generator sites.

A Sites object defines the locations of sites from which molecules are generated and added into the environment. Multiple molecules generated from the same sites are tracked by a list of Site objects, which map the molecule code to the correct environment lattices.

Since:
2.3
Version:
2.3.8
See Also:
Serialized Form
